data.name: BLACK COFFEE
data.mota: A cup of fragrant black coffee smelling of cocoa is the best self-rewarding gift for those who love the most original essence of coffee.

data.name: AMERICAN CAPPUCCINO
data.mota: Cappuccino is fun called a one-third - 1/3 Espresso drink, 1/3 Hot milk, 1/3 Foam.

data.name: MILK COFFEE
data.mota: Coffee phin combined is also condensed milk is a drink that is considered a brand drink of Vietnam.

data.name: BAC SIU
data.mota: Bac siu is a glass of white milk with a little coffee.

data.name: LATTE
data.mota: When preparing Latte, Espresso coffee and hot milk are mixed together, the top of which is covered with a thin and light layer of foam.

data.name: ESPRESSO
data.mota: An original cup of Espresso will give out the sweetness of the caramel, the sour taste is soothing and thick.

data.name: AMERICANO
data.mota: Americano is prepared by adding water a little to dilute the Espresso's denseness, thereby giving it a gentle and aromatic flavor.

data.name: MOCHA
data.mota: Mocha coffee is simply like chocolate sauce mixed with a special cup of Espresso

data.name: CARAMEL MACCHIATO
data.mota: The fatty aroma of milk foam and fresh milk, the serene bitterness of fine Espresso coffee, and the rich sweetness of caramel sauce.

data.name: BLUEBERRY SMOOTHIE
data.mota: Blueberry jam with sour bar, sweet coriander, rhythmically combined with nutritious yogurt line. It's a delicious smoothie that both the tip of the tongue and the skin like.

data.name: COOKIE AND CREAM
data.mota: Crunchy cookies combine well with fresh milk and sweet whipped cream, bringing a strange feeling of excitement.

data.name: ICED COFFEE GRINDER
data.mota: Black coffee is combined with fresh milk and sweet cream, creating a strange feeling.

data.name: CHOCOLATE
data.mota: Made from pure cocoa blended with fatty fresh milk. Creates a natural sweetness, not harsh neck, leaving a slight bitterness.

data.name: ICED MATCHA
data.mota: Matcha bar and light bitterness are double refreshing when drinking cold. Emphasize the fatty features of cream and milk.

data.name: MATCHA LATTE
data.mota: Matcha tea powder is mixed with fresh milk and soft foam, MATCHA LATTE is the favorite drink of most people visiting.

data.name: MELON YOGURT
data.mota: Limited edition

data.name: ICED RASPBERRY
data.mota: ICED RASPBERRY when drinking, it feels as fresh and relaxing as going to the beach.

data.name: PEACH BLUEBERRY ICED
data.mota: Create a cool and refreshing feeling

data.name: DUMPLING
data.mota: It has two quail eggs.

data.name: BREAD STICK
data.mota: Inside have lots of meat

data.name: SALTED EGG CAKE
data.mota: On the cake there is a salted egg.

data.name: MOUSSE PASSION CHEESE
data.mota: Passion Cheese Mousse Cake with cool, soft and spongy cream melts right in the mouth when eating will make anyone feel nausioned.
